input.sentences: the old light house stood tall and regal .
the ocean water was the deepest blue she had ever seen .
she could see the road that connected to two islands .
she was amazed at the stunning views from the top of the light house .
below | the parking lot looked quite small in her mind .
output.sentences: The view from the majestic lighthouse was amazing.
One could see miles out into the ocean from it.
With only one road leading to it, it isn't very well known.
Those who do enjoy its view never want to come down.
Especially because it is the best spot for miles around.
